sense.gloss: formulation (of a plan, policy, etc.), decision, settling on

sdata.j: ↑隣↑↓となり↓の↑家↑↓いえ↓のラジオがうる|さくてい|らいらする。
sdata.e: The radio next door gets on my nerves.

sdata.j: ↑夜↑↓よる↓↑遅↑↓おそ↓く↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑帰↑↓かえ↓ると↑親↑↓おや↓がガミガミうる|さくて↑嫌↑↓い|や↓になっちゃう。どんなに↑遅↑↓おそ↓くても↑起↑↓お↓きて↑待↑↓ま↓ってるんだよ。↑寝↑↓ね↓てればいいのにさ。
sdata.e: Whenever I come home late at night, my parents scold me and it annoys me. No matter how late I come back, they're awake and waiting for me. It would be so nice if they just went to sleep instead.
